text: A concertina is a musical instrument that makes sounds using air pushed and pulled through reeds using a bellows. The fingers push buttons at both ends of the instrument. The Anglo concertina has the bass notes at the left side and makes other tones pushing than pulling a button. The English concertina makes the same tone pushing and pulling a button. The duet concertinas have the bass notes at the left side and make the same tone pushing and pulling a button. The Hayden duet concertina has the same fingering for all scales. It has a shifted 6-plus-6 keyboard layout. ==Related pages== * Bandoneon ==Other websites== Category:Keyboard instruments
title: Concertina
